blocks.title: Digital Skills Training
blocks.subtitle: Technology skills for the modern world, taught at your pace

blocks.heading: Bridging the Digital Divide
blocks.content:
In today's world, digital literacy is essential. Our Digital Skills program provides hands-on training for community members of all ages and experience levels.

From smartphone basics to job-ready computer skills, we meet you where you are and help you build confidence with technology.

blocks.heading: Training Tracks
blocks.subheading: Choose the path that fits your needs

cards.title: Digital Basics
cards.description: Smartphone use, email, internet safety, and social media basics for beginners.

cards.title: Computer Essentials
cards.description: Word processing, spreadsheets, file management, and internet research.

cards.title: Job-Ready Skills
cards.description: Professional email, online job applications, video conferencing, and more.

items.question: Do I need to bring my own computer?
items.answer: No! We have computers available for all in-person classes. If you'd like to bring your own device, you're welcome to do so.

items.question: What if I've never used a computer before?
items.answer: That's exactly who our Digital Basics track is designed for! We start from the very beginning with patient, supportive instruction.

items.question: Are classes available in Spanish?
items.answer: Yes! We offer select workshops in Spanish. Contact us for the current schedule of Spanish-language classes.

items.question: Can I get help with a specific technology problem?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer drop-in Tech Help hours every Wednesday from 2-4 PM where you can get one-on-one assistance.

items.quote: At 52, I thought it was too late to learn computers. Now I video chat with my grandchildren every week and even applied for a job online!
items.author: Robert Chen

items.quote: The Job-Ready Skills course helped me update my resume and learn video conferencing. I got a remote job within two months!
items.author: Priya Sharma

blocks.heading: Ready to Get Started?
blocks.text: New workshops start every month. Register today to secure your spot.
